hiveArticle.title: Another Beautiful Flower
hiveArticle.body:
As the title suggests, not only the flower is beautiful but you can see how well the flowers are blooming i.e. in all directions. I also tried to capture it with the macro lens to show how beautifully the web is lying over the flower.

![image.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmSUDQfFQpQKYbjtyUNbFJ1kN75cJ6T5bJeoygN9QSuvcj)

### Camera: Nokia 6
